item.description:
Timoth Donnelly, Poetry Editor of Boston Review, has been invited to appear under the aegis of the Annual Stratis Haviaras Reading.

This reading will take place in the Thompson Room at the Barker Center in Harvard Yard; the Barker Center is bordered by Prescott, Harvard, and Quincy Streets. Enter the courtyard from Quincy Street, opposite the Lamont Gate. The Barker Center is the large brick building facing the Faculty Club.
item.name: Timoth Donnelly reading at Harvard
